thread.title: Pauline Bier

author: Pauline Bier
title: Pauline Bier
text:
I was surprise in the good way by Moo !
At first, I just saw this ad on Facebook, recommending me to shipping on Moo. And one day I just clicked on the link.
After that I saw that I could order a free sample, to saw all the textures and sizes. So I did it !
And when I saw the quality of the cards and the professionalism of the company I directly thought about trying it.
So I made my design with one of their template, and I received my business cards so quickly.
I thought the price was a bit expensive, but when I saw the quality and the result, I just think it was worth it ! I recommend Moo !
